casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
JOSEPH R. B. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2017

Naomi T. Fetterman, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 518, 164 A.3d 718 (2017), is denied.
